description: This file is a startup script for setting up and managing a PostgreSQL database server, including initialization, startup, checking if running, creating database and user, setting permissions, and saving connection info.

methods.name: pg_isready
methods.description: Checks if PostgreSQL server is accepting connections on specified port

methods.name: initdb
methods.description: Initializes a new PostgreSQL data directory

methods.name: psql
methods.description: Command-line interface for PostgreSQL to execute SQL commands
